title: Blox Fruits: How to Get and Use Dark Fruit (Guide)

steps.title: Dark Fruit is an Uncommon Elemental type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: Dark Fruit is an Uncommon Elemental type Blox Fruit. It's obtained by purchasing it from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $500,000 or 950 Robux.

steps.title: Dark Fruit is great for PvP once it's been awakened.
steps.content: Dark Fruit is great for PvP once it's been awakened. It can stun users for a long time, plus it has a teleporting move. This means it's a great Fruit to use if you are a Sword or Gun main. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Dark Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken.
steps.content: Dark Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken. Fragments can be obtained in several ways, but you'll most likely get them from finishing raids or defeating Sea Beasts. The order in which to awaken your moves is as follows: Z: 500 Fragments F: 2,000 Fragments X: 3,000 Fragments C: 4,000 Fragments V: 5,000 Fragments After awakening Dark Fruit, you'll get the Dark Lord title (#035).

steps.title: Dark Rocks (Z)
steps.content: Dark Rocks ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3402 Cooldown: 7.5 seconds Description: You fling black rocks from your hand towards the cursor. If these rocks hit an enemy, they will cause damage.

steps.title: Black Spiral (X)
steps.content: Black Spiral ( X ) Mastery cost: 40 Mastery Damage: 2506-3581 Cooldown: 12.5 seconds Description: You create a black hole where the cursor is positioned. This black hole damages and stuns, and the damage/stun increases the longer this move is held. Once released, the enemy is launched away.

steps.title: Black Hole (C)
steps.content: Black Hole ( C ) Mastery cost: 80 Mastery Damage: 4476 Cooldown: 21.5 seconds Description: You create a black hole around you on the ground. Anyone caught in this attack will be damaged and caused to levitate.

steps.title: Dark Bomb (V)
steps.content: Dark Bomb ( V ) Mastery cost: 110 Mastery Damage: 4745 Cooldown: 27.5 seconds Description: You create a large darkness orb above your head, then launch it towards the cursor. Targets will be pulled inside and take damage.

steps.title: Dimensional Slash (Z)
steps.content: Dimensional Slash ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 500 Fragments Damage: 3223 Cooldown: 7.5 seconds Description: You swing a dark sword and send a flash of dark energy towards the target. This will blind the target, and it will also teleport you closer to them and do damage.

steps.title: Abyssal Darkness (X)
steps.content: Abyssal Darkness ( X ) Mastery cost: 40 Mastery Fragments cost: 3,000 Fragments Damage: 233-3259 Cooldown: 10.5 seconds Description: You create a black hole through which dark tentacles lash out. If these tentacles hit an enemy, they will stun them, pull them in, and cause damage. The longer you hold the move, the more damage it will do. This move also breaks instinct.

steps.title: Endless Hole (C)
steps.content: Endless Hole ( C ) Mastery cost: 80 Mastery Fragments cost: 4,000 Fragments Damage: 504-3357 Cooldown: 15 seconds Description: You create an expanding black hole on the ground the longer you hold this move. Enemies caught in this hole will take damage. This move also breaks instinct.

steps.title: World of Darkness (V)
steps.content: World of Darkness ( V ) Mastery cost: 110 Mastery Fragments cost: 5,000 Fragments Damage: 5192 Cooldown: 26.5 seconds Description: You create a swirling orb of darkness that launches towards the cursor. This orb will draw in enemies and damage them before knocking them back. This move also breaks instinct.

steps.title: Ghastly Step (F)
steps.content: Ghastly Step ( F ) Mastery cost: 0 Mastery Fragments cost: 2,000 Fragments Damage: n/a Cooldown: 6 seconds Description: You can teleport to your cursor location.

steps.title: Elemental Reflex
steps.content: Elemental Reflex You are immune to all attacks by Fighting Styles, Swords, and Guns, unless the attacks are imbued with Aura or the enemy is a higher level than you.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Good for fighting bosses Low mastery requirements for new players Easy to obtain Not difficult to awaken Many moves can stun

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Many moves are easily punishable Doesn't have great range Cooldowns are too long for grinding Moves have small hitboxes Moves can be hard to control
